TopicTitle: G'day - new intrepid explorer reporting for adventure

Articles.Content:
Just thought I'd drop and say hi

After hearing about this Kerbal Space Program thingie from a bunch of different places (although, I didn't know anyone else who'd played it) I thought I'd give it a go.

Downloaded 0.23.5 just before the 0.24 update - decided to play the full career mode to help with the learning curve.

Not doing too badly - although with fairly judicious use of quicksaves and reverting - having a ball every time I mess up my staging and cause something to explode. Managed to get to Minmus and back on the first go and banked a ton of funds. So, yeah, looking forward to posting awesome pics and swapping stories with everyone here.
Hello HorusKol, and welcome to the forum. We are looking forward to your pics and stories, too.
Good luck! Shouldn't be too hard to find adventures around here, play kerbal long enough and something will break and turn into one on it's own
Welcome in the Kerbal Space Program Forums! Post a link to your pictures if you uploaded them.
